Package rosterProject

Class Date

java.lang.Object
rosterProject.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Date object class Handles calculations pertaining to dates, such as checking if a data is valid or comparing dates
Author:
Robert Reid, Anthony Romanushko
